findings.title: ST - Stops Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop the transactions for all users.

findings.title: MT - Mints Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to mint tokens. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the `mint` function. As a result, the contract tokens will be highly inflated.

findings.title: BC - Blacklists Addresses
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop addresses from transactions. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the `blockAddress` function.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Non-conformity to Solidity naming convention guidelines affects code readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L11 - Unnecessary Boolean equality
findings.description: Boolean equality is unnecessary when comparing two boolean values.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The team is advised to lock the pragma to ensure the stability of the codebase.
